events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review it and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering for the software developer role based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to your application to guide you through the recruitment process.
We completed the initial screening interview, discussing your development experience and understanding of software engineering principles.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed responses during the initial screening. We are excited to consider you for the next stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-04-18 at 10 AM UTC with the engineering lead.
